titleStmt.title: New mad Tom of Bedlam. Or, The man in the moon drinks clarret, vvith powder-beef, turnip and carret. Tune is, Grays-Inn Mask.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by and for A.M. and sold by the booksellers of London,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Forth from my sad and pecksome cell ..."
Cut in half, mounted, and bound with second ballad first.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
